original_text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest, where the scribes and the elders were assembled.
korean_text: 예수를 잡은 자들이 그를 끌고 대제사장 가야바에게로 가니 거기 서기관과 장로들이 모여 있더라

sentences.original_text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus
led him away to Caiaphas the high priest
where the scribes and the elders were assembled
